page.title: 03SURVEY OF OGWELL & DENBURY
page.content: To find out more about our area we asked some questions of the people who live here.We asked which facilities they used,whether they had to travel to work,how long they had lived here and what they thought of the changes that have happened recently.We found that most people have not lived in the vilages for very long but most of the farms had been in the same family for generations.Most people used the village shop and post office,and used the local milkman.Many people were not happy with the services in the village,expecialy the buses which they thought were expensive and infrequent.Although Channings Wood prison gives work to a lot of people in the area,most people work outside the village. Darren Salmons,Melanie Ottewell and Emma Peck Aged 10
